altTitles.ja: アズールレーン４コママンガ　びそくぜんしんっ！

description.en: Official 4-koma webcomic from the popular mobile game Azur Lane.
The heartwarming story of two different girls brought together over a cat, as they learn about each other, spend time together, and heal one another.
description.es-la: Una conmovedora historia de dos chicas, diferente una de la otra, que se conocen por un encuentro con un gato y desde entonces han estado acompañándose y consolándose .

altTitles.uk: Чи правда, що ви одружуєтесь? [365 днів до весілля]

altTitles.ja: 結婚するって、本当ですか

altTitles.ja-ro: Kekkon suru tte, Hontou desu ka

altTitles.th: แต่งงานที่ว่านี่เรื่องจริงเหรอครับ?

description.en: Takuya and Rika are co-workers for a travel agency and have barely ever interacted as they are both introverted, anti-social people. Both are doing their jobs as normal when an announcement from the higher-ups comes down: in one year, an overseas branch will be opening in Siberia, and an employee from their location will be sent to work there! While there's no telling who will be chosen to go, it is explained that people who are married and have families are far less likely to be sent! Neither Takuya nor Rika want to go to Siberia! Desperate to protect their solitary lives, they develop a plan: pretend that they are getting married to each other! Will they be able to keep up this charade for 365 days, and, maybe, even fall for one another in that time?
description.ru: Такуя и Рика — коллеги по туристическому агентству, они практически не общались друг с другом, так как оба — интроверты. Оба заняты своим делом, как обычно, когда приходит объявление от вышестоящего руководства: через год в Сибири откроется зарубежный филиал, и сотрудник из их отдела будет отправлен туда на работу! Неизвестно, кого выберут, но объяснили, что вероятность того, что туда отправят женатых и имеющих семьи, гораздо ниже, чем одиночек! Ни Такуя, ни Рика не хотят ехать в Сибирь! Отчаявшись защитить свою одинокую жизнь, они придумывают план: сделать вид, что женятся друг на друге! Смогут ли они продержаться 365 дней и, может быть, даже влюбиться друг в друга за это время?
description.uk: Гонджоуджі Ріка та Оогара Такуя працюють у відділі планування туристичної агенції JTC в Токіо, вони не люблять спілкуватися і повноцінно живуть спокійним життям наодинці. Однак через відкриття філії в Сибіру Ріка запропонувала Такуї план, щоб не відправитися за кордон. Чи одружаться ці двоє замкнутих людей всього за 365 днів?
description.pt-br: Takuya e Rika são colegas de trabalho de uma agência de viagens e quase nunca interagiram, pois ambos são introvertidos, pessoas anti-sociais. Ambos estão fazendo seu trabalho normalmente quando um anúncio dos superiores chega: em um ano, uma filial no exterior será aberta na Sibéria, e um funcionário de sua localidade será enviado para trabalhar lá! Embora não se saiba quem será escolhido para ir, explica-se que as pessoas que são casadas e têm família são muito menos propensas a serem enviadas! Nem o Takuya nem a Rika querem ir para a Sibéria! Desesperados para proteger suas vidas solitárias, eles criam um plano: fingir que vão se casar um com o outro! Serão capazes de manter esta farsa por 365 dias, e, talvez, até se apaixonar um pelo o outro nesse tempo?

description.en:
"Young Master Chi, you're not going to help me unconditionally, are you?"

"You'll find out soon enough what this deal entails. Now, all you need to do is give me an answer. Do you want this opportunity or not?"

"Yes, I do."

Chi Mingyao made a deal with an actor who was brave enough to block him because of a car accident. He only wanted to tease the little actor at first, but eventually, he genuinely wanted to befriend Li Yangxiao and pass on his good luck to him—all so that Yangxiao could chase his dreams without a care in the world.

"Is this how it feels to have a friend?" 

Bibi is obsessed with Peter, the prince of the school. When she spots Amy next to him, she starts to feel jealous. She invites Amy to her house to warn her, but instead takes a liking to the girl. They agree to be friends on the condition that Amy has to help Bibi confess.
description.fr:
"C'est ce qu'on ressent lorsqu'on a une amie ?"
Bibi est obsédée par Peter, le prince de l'école. Lorsqu'elle repère Amy près de lui, elle commence à être jalouse. Elle invite Amy chez elle pour la prévenir, mais à la place, elle commence à apprécier cette fille. Elles acceptent d'être amies à la condition que Amy doive aider Bibi à se déclarer.
description.ko:
"원래 친구 사이엔 이런 기분이 드는 걸까?"

'비비'는 학교 제일의 킹카 피터에게 집착하다, 그의 곁에 있던 '에이미'를 보고 질투를 느낀다. 그녀에게 경고하기 위해서 자신의 집에 초대했지만 오히려 호감을 느끼게 되고...
둘은 비비의 고백을 돕는다는 조건으로 서로에게 유일한 친구가 되기로 한다.
description.ru:
"Вот что значит быть друзьями?" Биби одержима Питэром, принцем школы.
Когда она замечает Эми рядом с ним, она начинает ревновать. Она приглашает Эми к себе, чтобы предупредить. Но вместо этого Эми нравится ей. Они соглашаются быть друзьями, но при одном условии: Эми должна помочь Биби признаться в любви.

altTitles.ja: 卒業
初戀MALISA

description.en: The sweet and the sour of a first love! Boy or girl, everyone is looking forward to that first encounter. No words can describe the nervousness and excitement felt at that destined moment! Perhaps the story of your first love, too, is collected in the First Love MALISA series. Malisa Lin's new work is filled with delicate artwork, elaborate drama, rich laugh-out-loud moments, and perfect endings. This series tells stories of "falling in love"…

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム N-EXTREME

description.en:
One day, Amagi Sai and Ebihara Chikage are transported to another world by a mysterious woman who wants them to save the world. 
The first volume of the collaboration comic for the popular arcade game "Mobile Suit Gundam EXVS.2 XB" is now available!
description.ja: アマギ・サイとエビハラ・チカゲはある日、世界を救って欲しいという謎の女性によって異世界に転移させられてしまう…！？ 大人気アーケードゲーム「機動戦士ガンダムEXVS.2 XB」コラボコミック第1巻登場！

title.en: Kimi no Risou no Maid ni Naru

altTitles.ja: キミの理想のメイドになる！

description.en:
To return her master's kindness, her goal is to become the ideal maid.

A classic romantic comedy of love with perfect sugar content begins!

A few months into his high school life, Renya Nijou has no friends or girlfriend and spends his days living alone. But one day, he witnesses how Maya Kamishiro, the most beautiful girl in his class, was about to be kidnapped by mysterious men dressed in black, apparently Maya was sold by her parents to pay their debts, so Renya decides to help her with the financial resources he got through investments, but Maya can't help but want to return the favor, and declares that she will become Renya's maid...?

title.en: Screw the Noble Life, I’m Going Home

altTitles.en: Noble Lady or Whatever, I'm Going Home

description.en:
After confirming that I had won the lottery, I tried to quit my job! However, as soon as I opened the door, I found myself transmigrated into the body of a noble lady. I have one year to claim the prize money, so I have to return home at all costs. Please wait for me, my 1.7 million won! Mum will be there soon, but... What's wrong with this family?!

"I love you." But I'm not your daughter!

"Sister, you might get hurt so I'll hold you." Did he mean he would lift me? What is this guy, a giant brown bear?

"If you mess with our sister one more time, I'll make you disappear without a trace." He's got a pretty face, but he has a sharp tongue.

"Don't fall ill." Don't worry about me. Why are there so many of them?! I'm not a noble lady! Leave me alone, I wanna go home!

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

altTitles.ru: Иона: Девушка, стоящая в лучах рассвета

altTitles.ja: 暁のヨナ

altTitles.en: Yona: The Girl Standing in the Blush of Dawn

altTitles.th: กู้บัลลังก์มังกรแดง

description.en:
Yona is the sole princess of the Kingdom of Kouka, living a luxurious and carefree life as a princess should. She has it all: the finest clothes and cosmetics, the most divine sweets, a loving emperor as a father, and the hottest cousin crush, Soo-won, any girl could ever hope to have. Now, if only her bodyguard, Son Hak, weren't so annoying towards her, and if her hair weren't so red…  
But her nearly perfect world quickly shatters as the man she loves, Soo-won, murders her father and the path to his ascension to the throne is assured. Son Hak escapes with Yona, and they lead a life on the run from that point on.  
  


---
description.id: Dahulu kala, 2.000 tahun yang lalu Kerajaan Kouka didirikan dan diperintah oleh seekor naga merah yang turun ke Bumi dari Surga berubah menjadi manusia dengan nama Hiryuu. Di sisinya, empat prajurit yang dijiwai dengan darah naga dari para Dewa yang membantunya memimpin kerajaan menuju kemakmuran. Waktu berlalu, dan kisah ini menjadi legenda untuk diceritakan kepada anak-anak. 2.000 tahun kemudian, kerajaan tidak memiliki ahli waris laki-laki kecuali seorang putri tunggal bernama Yona yang hidup dalam kemewahan. Jatuh cinta dengan sepupunya, Soo-Won , dan dilindungi oleh pengawalnya, Son Hak , dia memiliki semua yang dia inginkan dan terlindung dari kenyataan mengerikan di luar tembok kastil. Bertentangan dengan ilusi damai ini, Kouka mengalami pergolakan politik dari dalam kerajaan. Setelah Su-won yang dicintainya melakukan kudeta berdarah dan membunuh ayahnya, Yona terpaksa melarikan diri hanya dengan Hak di sisinya dan mulai menjalani kehidupan dalam pelarian. Meskipun dikelilingi oleh musuh di semua sisi, putri yang dibuang itu masih ingin menyelamatkan kerajaannya. Solusinya datang dari seorang pendeta yang diasingkan, yang mengatakan kepadanya bahwa satu-satunya harapannya adalah menemukan empat prajurit naga legendaris. Dipandu oleh mitos yang tampaknya fiktif ini, Yona berangkat untuk menemukan para pejuang ini, bertekad untuk memperjuangkan tahta, dan memulihkan kerajaan sambil menjalin pertemanan dan sekutu baru di sepanjang jalan.
description.ru:
Йона — единственная принцесса королевства Коука. Она ведет роскошную и беззаботную жизнь, как и подобает принцессам. У неё есть всё: лучшая одежда и косметика, превосходные сладости, любящий отец Император Иль, и сильнейшие чувства к кузену Су Вону, о котором многие могли лишь мечтать. Вот только если бы её телохранитель Сон Хак не так раздражал и её волосы не были такими красными.   
Все меняется в ночь на шестнадцатый день рождения девушки. Почти идеальный мир быстро рассыпается, когда человек, которого она любит — Су Вон — убил её отца. Путь к его становлению на престол ныне гарантирован. Вместе с Хаком, Йона скрылась из замка в поисках помощи, и с этого момента они ведут жизнь в бегах…
description.pt-br: Yona, única princesa do reino, era apaixonada pelo seu primo e tinha uma vida luxuosamente despreocupada, como toda princesa. Mas tudo muda depois de uma traição que a obriga a fugir do castelo com seu guarda-costas, Son Hak. Nisso, eles descobrem sobre uma lenda que mudará totalmente o destino deles.

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

title.en: That Time I Got a Black-Haired Gyaru Behind Me When I Changed Seats

altTitles.ja: 席替えしたら後ろの席が黒髪ギャルだった件
ごちうさ
ご注文はうさぎですか？

altTitles.zh: 请问您今天要来点兔子吗

description.en: One day, Cocoa arrived in a town for a work-stay program as organized by her school. There, she excitingly entered the café "Rabbit House," expecting to be able to cuddle rabbits, but instead she found the Kafuu residence, her new home where she will be staying. In this town she will meet her precious and important friends, a responsible, calm but cute girl named Chino, a tough and soldier-esque girl named Rize, a spacey and quintessentially Japanese girl named Chiya, and the ordinary but dignified Syaro.

altTitles.ja: カッパ少年紅介〜昭和妖怪恋物語

altTitles.zh: 河童少年红介~昭和妖怪恋物语~

altTitles.ja: 天より高く

description.en: When the Devil King announces his retirement, he calls forth his two sons, Yomi and Sora, to give them each a quest. Whichever of them finds a pure Yamato maiden within a year would inherit the throne of the Devil King, while the other would die. Thus begins Sora's sex-fuelled adventure to find a woman that can satisfy his father…

altTitles.en: I Want to See You Embarrassed

altTitles.ja: 恥じらう君が見たいんだ

altTitles.th: เทคนี้ที่ผมถ่ายเป็นเรื่องน่าอายที่เธอไม่คัท

altTitles.en: I Want To See You Blush

altTitles.zh-hk: 想看妳露出羞恥的模樣

description.en: Akito Shirasawa, a high school boy whose father is a film director, sees something in the library preparation room. It was the "masturbation scene" of his classmate, Kaho Honjou. Akito is puzzled, but ends up filming it with his smartphone. Kaho notices Akito, and in the men's restroom, makes a "proposal" to Akito! Exposed high school girl and movie boy. The "exposed love" of twisted adolescence, begins!
description.es-la: Akito Shirasawa, un chico de secundaria cuyo padre es director de cine, ve algo en la sala de preparación de la biblioteca. Era la "escena de la masturbación" de su compañera de clase, Natsuho Honjo. Akito está desconcertado, pero termina filmándolo con su teléfono inteligente. Natsuho nota a Akito, y en el baño de hombres, ¡le hace una "propuesta" a Akito! Chica de secundaria expuesta y chico de película. ¡Comienza el "amor expuesto" de la retorcida adolescencia!

altTitles.ja: ザ・ファブル

description.en:
A fabled genius at killing resides somewhere hidden in Tokyo. Taught since childhood to obey the orders of his boss, he is ordered to live in Osaka as a normal person for one year in order for the boss to lay low.    ---- **Won the 41st Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2017**
___
[Alt Official English (US ONLY)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10055/episode/323851)

title.en: After Becoming Everyone's Favorite, I Went on a Killing Spree

altTitles.zh: 成为团宠后，我大杀四方

description.en: Growing up as an orphan in the arena, Ora was determined to awaken her summoner bloodline and gain immense power. However, her world turns upside down when she learns that the king has taken her loyal companion, Dragong, putting him in grave danger. In a daring escape, Ora and Dragong flee together, embarking on a series of thrilling adventures. Along the way, Ora hones her strength and resilience, while meticulously planning her revenge against those who have wronged her.

altTitles.th: นายเงือกของเดซาโรว

description.en:
Desharow, a Biology student at the Russian Maritime Academy, embarked on a long distance voyage with his mentor, Rhine, where the two caught a mysterious black scaled merman in Iceland. Little did he know that this mysterious black and evil creature had long viewed him as his prey…

Official Translations:
[Official Korean Translation](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/11357)

title.en: Help! I Had Transmigrated and My Snake Husband Pampered Me Too Much

altTitles.zh: Jiù Mìng! Chuān Yuè Shòu Shì Shé Fū Chāo Chǒng Wǒ!
救命！穿越兽世蛇夫超宠我！

altTitles.zh-ro: Jiu Ming! Chuan Yue Shou Shi She Fu Chao Chong Wo!

description.en:
Lu Ling transmigrated into the Beast World novel that he had just read halfway through before going to bed, and became a cannon fodder, deer beast.

The current plot is that after Lu Linggang agreed to Snake Ying's "courtship" request, he would use his fiancé Snake Ying to get the winter resources.

After Lu Ling transmigrated, she couldn't bear Snake Shadow to experience the plot of being "betrayed by herself" and "ruthlessly abandoned" again.

Although Snake Shadow's departure may lead to her failure in the future, Lu Ling still decided to "break off the marriage", but she was helpless every time.

What will happen to Lu Ling?
description.fr:
Lu Ling s'est fait transmigré dans le monde d'un livre alors qu'elle était en train de le lire avant d'aller se coucher et après cela elle devenu une biche !

Elle est arrivé au moment de l'histoire où Lu Ling a accepté de devenir la partenaire de She Ying pour récupéré ses ressources pour l'hiver.

Après avoir transmigré Lu Ling n'a pas supporté de faire subir ça a She Ying et donc elle assez de s'éloigner de lui.
Meme si le fait de quitter She Ying, pourrait mener à sa fin, Lu Ling a quand même décidé de se séparer de lui...

Que va t-il se passé et arrivé a Lu Ling dans ce nouveau monde ? Va t-elle rester avec She Ying ? Comment va t-elle vivre dans ce nouveau monde ?
description.zh: 鹿灵穿越到自己睡前刚看了一半的兽世小说中，成了一只炮灰鹿兽女配。目前的剧情正是鹿灵刚答应蛇影的“求偶”请求后，马上要利用未婚夫蛇影过冬的剧情。鹿灵穿越后，不忍蛇影再次经历被“自己背叛”和“无情抛弃”的剧情，虽然蛇影的离开可能会导致自己过冬失败，但鹿灵还是决定要“退婚”，无奈每次都被打断。

altTitles.ja: パンプキンナイト

description.en: A deformed female human goes out with a pumpkin on her head to kill all those who bullied her in the past after escaping from a mental hospital.
description.es: Una deforme chica sale con una calabaza en su cabeza para matar a todos aquellos que la acosaron en su pasado después de escapar de un manicomio.
description.fr: Victime de sévices orchestrés aux yeux de tous par ses camarades de classe, une collégienne a été interné dans un hôpital psychiatrique. Plusieurs mois plus tard, alors que ses bourreaux sont aujourd’hui au lycée, ils apprennent qu’elle s’est échappée en tuant tout le personnel hospitalier qui a tenté de lui barrer la route et qu’elle est bien décidé à se venger d’eux.
description.kk: Бет әлпеті қатты зақымданған, оқушы қыз, бұрын оны келеке еткен адамдардың жандарын алу үшін, ауруханадан қашып шығады.
description.pt: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que a maltrataram no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.
description.pt-br: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que fizeram bullying com ela no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.

description.en: A storm of the universe brought species mutations. The poison, undead, giants and monsters in the city roared as they waved their weapons. As the beasts in the woods fought over territorial rights, humans, too, awakened an ability known as star power… Zhou Zheng, without star power, traversed to this apocalyptic world. Using the abilities of the thief character in the game, he destroys the darkness and fog, seeking supreme power!
description.fr:
Un mouvement dans l'univers a apporté des mutations au niveau des espèces vivantes. Un poison, des morts vivants, des géants et des monstres rugissent dans la ville en agitant leurs armes. Alors que des bêtes dans les bois se battent pour des territoires, certains humains éveillent une capacité spéciale connue sous le nom de pouvoir des étoiles... Zhou Zheng, déficient de ce pouvoir, va traverser ce nouveau monde post apocalyptique.
Utilisant ses capacités de voleur issue d'un autre jeu, il détruit ténèbres et brouillard, à la recherche du pouvoir suprême !
description.zh: 一场宇宙风暴带来了物种的变异。城市中的毒尸巨怪，挥动着战斧咆哮。丛林中的异兽们，争夺着领地的主权。人类也觉醒了一种名为星力的异能……没有星力的周正穿越到这个末世。利用游戏中盗贼的角色能力，他将撕毁黑暗迷雾，追逐至高的力量！

altTitles.es-la: El Camino a Casa Después de la Escuela

altTitles.ja: 放課後帰宅びより

altTitles.pt-br: Viagem para casa depois da escola

description.en: Shun was invited to the Going-Home Club by Naoki Satou, also known as "Chokki-chan". Despite refusing, he ends up being somewhat forcefully involved in the club's activities! A Going Home Club rom-com featuring a detour-loving high school girl and a new high school student who has lost his dream.
description.ja:
佐藤直希こと“直帰ちゃん”から帰宅部に勧誘された瞬。断ったのに、半ば強引な形で活動に参加させられるハメに！ 寄り道大好き女子高生と夢を失った新入生が紡ぐ帰宅部ラブコメディ！

---

Satō Naoki koto “chokki-chan” kara kitaku-bu ni kan'yū sa reta Shun. Kotowatta no ni, nakaba gōin'na katachi de katsudō ni sanka sa se rareru hame ni! Yorimichi daisuki mesukōsei to yume o ushinatta shin'nyūsei ga tsumugu kitaku-bu rabukomedi!
description.es-la: Shun fue invitado al Club de Irse a Casa por Naoki Satou, también conocida como "Chokki-chan". A pesar de negarse, acaba involucrándose a la fuerza en las actividades del club. Una comedia romántica del Club de Irse a Casa protagonizada por una chica de preparatoria amante de los desvíos y un nuevo estudiante de preparatoria que ha perdido su sueño.

altTitles.zh: 我成了反派大佬的小娇妻

description.en: The dainty flower idol Chen Cong Rong unluckily fell into a trap and awoke to a stunning naked man in her bed! Hahaha, is it okay to be with such a beautiful man? Hang on… Are you telling me I've switched places with the toxic, evil, and manipulative side character who won’t even survive 20% of the plot?! No, I'm definitely not ready to die!! Watch as I keep on living my ideal life!

I had a one-night stand with my boss?!
Jian Yoo is an editor at a fashion magazine. She frantically ran to Paris after hearing that her boyfriend is two-timing.
Not knowing better, she made a rash decision to sleep with a stranger she had just met there…
Three months later, the editor-in-chief of Jian’s company flew in from their headquarters in France. However, that man…. turned out to be the one Jian spent the night with!!
description.ko:
하룻밤을 같이 보낸 그 남자가 내 상사라고?!
패션지 의 에디터 유지안. 그녀는 약혼자의 양다리 소식에 무작정 파리로 떠난다.
그곳에서 우연히 만난 남자와 충동적으로 하룻밤을 보내 버리고…
3개월의 시간이 흐른 후, 지안의 회사에 만렙의 편집장이 프랑스에서 오게 된다. 그런데 그 남자… 바로 지안과 하룻밤을 보낸 프랑스에서의 그 남자다!!
description.vi: Tôi đã có tình một đêm với sếp của mình ?! Jian Yoo là biên tập viên của một tạp chí thời trang. Cô rất hay chạy đến Paris sau khi nghe tin bạn trai của mình ngoại tình. Không biết làm gì hơn, cô ấy đã quyết định ngủ với một người lạ mà cô ấy mới gặp ở đó…Ba tháng sau, tổng biên tập của công ty mà Jian làm việc bay đến từ trụ sở chính của họ ở Pháp. Tuy nhiên, người đàn ông đó…. hóa ra là người mà Jian đã qua đêm cùng!!

title.en: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi

altTitles.ja: これからだんだん幸せになっていく怖い 女上司

altTitles.ar: رئيسة مرعبة تزداد سعادة وسعادة من الآن فصاعدًا

altTitles.ja-ro: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi
Korekara Dondon Shiawase ni Natte iku Kowai Jōshi

altTitles.en: A Scary Boss, But From Now on She's Going to Be Happier and Happier

altTitles.es-la: Una jefa que da miedo, pero a partir de ahora va a ser cada vez más feliz.

description.ar: مديرتي مخيفة للغايه، لكن من الأن وصاعدًا سأبذل قصارى جهدي لجعلها الأسعد.
description.en:
This is a heart-pounding love comedy between "Manager Tsuruse'', a female boss who is scary at work but whose hobbies are cute clothes(?!), and "Tsukinawa-kun'', a new male employee who joins the company mid-career!

There is also a FANBOX version, a collection of 0.5 "Naughty" stories: 
[Kowai Onna Joushi ga Nuidara H de Kawaikatta Hanashi - FANBOX 0.5 Matome【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/ef970af6-8357-43bb-9bd1-fe09dba78624/kowai-onna-joushi-ga-nuidara-h-de-kawaikatta-hanashi-fanbox-0-5-matome)
description.es-la: Mi jefa da mucho miedo, pero mientras más hablo con ella deja de hacerlo.

title.en: A 35-Year Old Transferred to the Elf Department

altTitles.ja: エルフ課に配属された35歳
ヤンデレちゃん×ネガティブちゃん

description.en: Collection of one/two-pagers from the author's Twitter featuring specific characters

altTitles.ja: かんたべりーでいず！

description.en: An official slice of life themed 4 panel webmanga of the Guardian Tales series.

altTitles.ja: ぬるめた

description.en:
Kurumi, the dumb android.  
Chiaki, her guardian with a few screws loose.  
Sakina, calm, composed, and easily amused.  
Shiyuki, the only sane(?) girl.  
  
Follow their exciting high school life as they tinker with and pamper Kurumi, as well as talk about nothing in particular.

altTitles.ja: 煩悩☆西遊記

description.en: The manga is a re-imagining of the famous Chinese classic Journey to the West story, and centers on the Buddhist priest Genjō and his journey to India as he is accompanied by three beautiful and charming women: Son Gokū, Cho Hakkai, and Sha Gojyo.
description.ja:
真の救済が記されてるという経典を得るため、孫悟空・猪八戒・沙悟浄を共にし、天竺を目指す三蔵法師。

その道のりで襲いかかる試練が
・・・・・・・・全部エロい。

仏の道に生きる三蔵にとっては貞操を失うこと、それ即ち死。果たして三蔵法師は煩悩に打ち克ち、貞操を守り抜けるのか？

title.en: My Sect's Senior Disciple Has a Hole in His Brain

altTitles.en: There's a Pit in My Senior's Brain
There's Something Wrong with My Da Shixiong's Brain

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Jia Da Shi Xiong Nao Zi You Keng

description.en:
The hilarious adventures of the eldest disciple of a sect who has a problem with his brain. Dong Fang Xian Yun was reincarnated as the most senior disciple of the Carefree sect. But the only thing that goes through his mind is to make sure he doesn't end up dying by the hands of the "main character". Read as he makes no sense to his fellow disciples while avoiding flags left and right.  
  
*Note : Although there are many chapters listed as missing, nothing is actually missing, some of chapter combining into one.*
A collection of stories between two boys when they were still students.

title.en: Isekai Saikouhou no Guild Leader ~Guild Saijaku no Boku da Kedo, Guild Members Zen'in no ai ga Omokute Guild o Yameraremasen~

altTitles.ja: 異世界最高峰のギルドリーダー～ギルド最弱の僕だけど、ギルメン全員の愛が重くてギルドをやめられません～

altTitles.en: Another World's Highest Guild Leader: I'm the Weakest in the Guild, But I Can't Quit the Guild Because of the Heavy Love of All the Guild Members

description.en: I thought that if I reincarnated, I would be able to build a happy harem and be peerless in another world...! ! The guild that was created on a whim has become the pinnacle guild of strong men. Moreover, except for me, everyone is handsome and beautiful. I'm the weakest in the guild... can I quit the guild now? The opening of the dark fantasy of the lethargic hero and the guild members who adore him at the level of worship――

altTitles.en: I Will Live as an Actor

altTitles.ja: 役者として生きる

description.en:
Jang Young-guk’, who achieved great success as a supporting actor.
Received the first and honorable Best Supporting Actor Award at the Acting Awards.

However, on that day, his mother passed away…

Horrified by the death of his mother, whom he neglected for years, Young-guk decided to end his life…

Before his death, he longingly recalled the warmth of his mother and the peaceful memories of the past. He regretted turning his back on those memories…

At that moment, he suddenly regressed to his childhood…

“I regressed, to that past I missed”

“As an inescapable fact, this life is just…”

Once again, the story of a person who wants to live as an actor begins.
Will he be able to live a happy life unlike the previous life?

altTitles.ja: ペーパーブレイバー

description.en:
In contemporary Japan, descendants of the Holy Warriors live in secret, awaiting the resurrection of the Demon King.
Shiromado Hijiri is the successor of the Great White Witch who can use recovery magic.

One day, she encounters the very descendant of the Yuusha who she is fated to serve...!

altTitles.en: How to Survive at the Academy

altTitles.pt-br: O Guia de Sobrevivência do Extra da Academia
O Guia de Sobrevivência do Figurante da Academia

description.en: I possessed a third-rate extra villain character in my favorite game. I have no ambitions and I just want to live a quiet life. But sheesh, this world is a hard place to survive in. I will survive to the ending of this story, in a way the protagonist cannot. I will survive in the way of a third-rate villainous character.
description.pt-br: Eu possuía um personagem vilão extra de terceira categoria em meu jogo favorito. Não tenho ambições e só quero viver uma vida tranquila. Mas, caramba, este mundo é um lugar difícil de sobreviver. Eu sobreviverei até o final desta história, de uma forma que o protagonista não conseguirá. Sobreviverei à maneira de um personagem vilão de terceira categoria.

altTitles.ja: キャプテンキッド

description.en: In the 19th century, there lived a young pirate king, feared enough to be called the “Devil of the Sea”. His name is Captain Kid! With his mysterious guardian sword, Black Lightning, he sails the seven seas aboard his vessel, the Golden Drake!! What awaits him? Is it hell, or the furious waves of the ocean?! The adventurous tale of Kid and his band of rogues begins here!!

altTitles.ja: エイティエイトを2でわって

title.en: Kyoukai Meikyuu to Ikai no Majutsushi

altTitles.en: Boundary Labyrinth and the Foreign Magician

altTitles.ja: 境界迷宮と異界の魔術師

altTitles.zh: 境界迷宫与异界魔术师

altTitles.ru: Пограничный лабиринт и маг из другого мира

altTitles.zh-hk: 境界迷宮與異界魔術師

description.en: When Theodore was dropped into a waterway by his half-brother, he suddenly recalled the memory of his past life. He had been a Japanese citizen known as Kirishima Kagehisa, placed inside VRMMO character he had made in Break Force Online. "Theodore" is a Combat Mage that Kagehisa played within BFO, and he realized his skills were progressing well even in this other world. Theodore, who had lightly brushed off his half-brother to make his own place in the world, had ventured off to the large labyrinth existing at the Boundary City, Termuilles.

altTitles.en: May You Reach a Sacred Place
May the Holy One Come Early

description.en:
On the order of the High Priest, the holy kingdom’s inquisitor, “McClat” captures the wicked great witch, ‘Vienny’. Vienny, on the other hand, promises him she would assist him in his quest for the other witches. Although Vienny appears to be terrified in his presence, she is unconcerned about the witches' cleansing. McClat's sentiments and ideas get increasingly muddled with her presence...

**Note:** *The webtoon released as R15; it's not R19 like the novel.*

---
**Original Novel:**
* Naver Series: [Chapters](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5118113), [Volumes](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5159454), [Side Stories](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5390867)
* [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/102089074)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8937670), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=801038)

altTitles.ja: やんちゃギャルの安城さん

altTitles.th: คุณอันโจ หยอกนักเพราะรักนะ

description.de:
Seto ist ein total normaler und irgendwie langweiliger Schüler. Aus einem unerklärlichen Grund jedoch, lässt seine Mitschülerin Anjou ihn nicht in Ruhe! Der ernste Seto und die energische Anjou bilden ein kontrastreiches Duo, doch Anjou macht das nichts aus, da sie sehr viel Spaß hat, Seto zu necken. Andererseits hat Seto eine schwere Zeit mit Anjous Eskapaden. Wenn er doch nur wüsste, dass seine Reaktionen der Grund sind, dass Anjou weitermacht.  
  
Doch … ist ihr flirten wirklich nur gespielt …?
description.en:
Seto is a completely ordinary and somewhat boring high school student. Yet, for whatever reason, his errant gyaru classmate Anjou just won't leave him alone! The serious Seto and energetic Anjou make a contrasting duo, but Anjou doesn't seem to mind, as she has too much fun teasing him. On the other hand, Seto has a hard time dealing with all of her endless antics; little does he realize that his humorous reactions are precisely the reason Anjou enjoys his company.

But… just how much of her flirting is merely an act?
description.fr: Seto est un lycéen ne souhaitant qu'une chose : passer sa scolarité sans être remarqué et être en paix. Malheureusement pour lui, il attire l'attention de la pire personne possible dans sa classe, Anjou la gal. A partir de ce jour, le quotidien de Seto va drastiquement changer grâce (ou à cause) de sa camarade, cherchant à s'amuser au dépend de notre héros.
description.ja: 真面目でクラスの中でも目立たない瀬戸くんには、なぜかいつもイケてるギャルの安城さんがいちいちエロく絡んでくる。いつもギリギリでドキドキする思春期ぴちぴちラブコメディ！
description.ru: Сето - серьёзный старшеклассник, который вел тихую школьную жизнь, пока не стал жертвой дразнилок гяру Андзё-сан.
description.pt-br:
Seto é um estudante completamente comum e um tanto chato. Mesmo assim, por alguma razão, sua nada correta colega de classe Gal Anjou simplesmente não o deixa em paz!

O Seto sério e a enérgica Anjou formam uma dupla um tanto interessante, mas Anjou não parece se importar, pois se diverte muito provocando-o. Por outro lado, Seto tem dificuldade em lidar com todas as suas travessuras intermináveis; mal ele percebe que suas reações humorísticas são precisamente o motivo pelo qual Anjou gosta de sua companhia.

Mas… quanto de seu flerte é meramente uma atuação?

description.en:
He was my best friend in the world. 
And that was enough.

Taesung and Wooyoung became best friends by chance when they were young.

Their friendship seemed to continue, even as they went to high school, but Wooyoung feels the desire to be more than just friends with Taesung.

Meanwhile, Taesung has become wary of Suhwa, who had become close to Wooyoung in high school. And an incident between Taesung and Suhwa causes a falling out between him and Wooyoung.

The two of them end up going to the same university without repairing the relationship. 

In order to rid himself of his feelings for Taesung, Wooyoung decides to cut off all contact and enlist in the army.  But he still struggles with his feelings.

After his military service, with Suhwa’s help, Wooyoung moves into an officetel, where he coincidentally reunites with Taesung…

The unrequited love which had started fresh and pure, had become gradually more intense as time passed.
Kwon Wooyoung felt like he was dying to have Go Taesung.

Kim Jeonji, a problem child who caused violence every day while in school, injured his leg in a motorcycle accident, retired from active duty (?), and is living a good life as a social misfit. Then, one day, he gets into an argument with the old beggar on the overpass, and he does something against the old beggar.... The old man is supposed to be a 'God'?
description.ru:
Ты был легендой — стал никем,
Как старый лев среди шакалов.
Мечты все обратились в тлен,
Погребены среди завалов.

Увидев слабого, толкни,
Пусть и его жизнь станет адом.
Вот только даже в наши дни
Легенды оживают рядом. © RSC
description.pt-br: Faça o bem ou vá para o inferno. As condições de sua nova maldição parecem simples o suficiente para o outrora esperançoso bandido Kim Jeonji. Ou assim parece quando seu animado anjo da guarda aparece em sua porta um dia e o cura. Mas será que simplesmente fazer o que é necessário para ajudar as pessoas será o suficiente para apaziguar um deus mesquinho com rancor?

title.en: Kiraware Majo Reijou to Dansou Ouji no Kon'yaku

altTitles.ja: 嫌われ魔女令嬢と男装皇子の婚約

altTitles.en: The Engagement of the Disgraced Witch and the Cross-Dressing Princess

altTitles.vi: Hôn Ước Của Phù Thủy Bị Ruồng Bỏ Và Công Chúa Cross-dressing

altTitles.es: El compromiso de la bruja deshonrada y la princesa travestida

altTitles.vi: Cuộc đính hôn giữa Nàng phù thủy bị ghét bỏ và Cô công chúa giả nam

altTitles.th: การหมั้นหมายของยัยเจ้าหญิงแต่งชายกับคุณหนูแม่มดผู้ถูกชิงชัง

altTitles.zh: 万人厌的魔女大小姐与男装皇子的婚约

altTitles.zh-hk: 萬人厭的魔女大小姐與男裝皇子的婚約

altTitles.zh-ro: Wàn rén yàn de mónǚ dà-xiǎojiě yǔ nánzhuāng huángzǐ de hūnyuē

altTitles.ru: Помолвка презираемой ведьмы и переодетой принцессы

altTitles.ko: 미움받는 마녀 영애와 남장 황자의 약혼

description.en:
Vilified by others as a "witch", Evris, the youngest daughter of the House of Bradley, is engaged to Mark, the fifth prince of the Kingdom of Klengel. When he abruptly announces that their engagement is broken off, Evris is plunged into despair. However, someone reaches out to her instead... The cross-dressing crown prince (♀) of a neighboring country!?

This is the story of a red-haired witch who manipulates shadows and a cross-dressing crown prince (♀) who is serving as a body double for her missing older brother. 

The curtain rises on a fantasy romantic comedy of a girl being teased by a princess!

Serialization began in the July 2023 issue of *Yuri Hime*.
description.ja:
「魔女」と罵られるブラッドリー家の末娘・イヴリスは、婚約相手であるクレンゲル王国第5王子・マルクに突然の婚約破棄を宣言されていた。絶望のどん底に落とされるイヴリス。しかし、そんな彼女に手を差し伸べるのは…隣国の男装皇太子!?
影を操る赤髪の魔女令嬢と失踪した兄の影武者となる男装皇子。
王子様系女子に翻弄されるファンタジーラブコメ開幕！
description.ru:
Эйвери, младшая дочь дома Брэдли, проклинаемая окружающими как "ведьма", помолвлена с Марком, пятым принцем королевства Кленгель. Когда он неожиданно объявляет, что их помолвка расторгнута, Эйвери впадает в отчаяние. Однако кто-то протягивает ей руку помощи... Наследный принц (♀) соседней страны?!

Это история о ведьме, управляющей тенями, и о переодетом наследном принце (♀), который является двойником пропавшего старшего брата.

Занавес приподнимается над фэнтезийной романтической комедией о девушке, которую дразнит принцесса!
description.tr:
Bu, gölgeleri manipüle eden kızıl saçlı bir cadı ile kayıp ağabeyinin dublörü olarak rol yapan melez veliaht prensin hikâyesidir.

Diğerleri tarafından “cadı” olarak lanetlenen Bradley Hanesi’nin en küçük kızı Evris, Klengel Krallığı’nın beşinci prensi Mark ile nişanlıdır. Mark aniden nişanı bozduğunu açıklayınca Evris umutsuzluğa kapılır. Ancak biri ona yardım elini uzatacaktır… Komşu ülkelerden birinin karşı cinsin kıyafetlerini giymeyi seven veliaht prensi!? Bir prenses tarafından dalga geçilen bir kızın fantastik romantik komedisinde perde açılıyor!

description.en: Yue Zhishi and Song Yu are not blood related brothers, Yue Zhishi, who was fostered by the Song family since childhood, loves to cling to his older brother, Song Yu, who is three years older than him. However, Song Yu always deliberately maintains a distance. Song Yu, the brother who pretends to be indifferent, and Yue Zhishi, the brother who is a clingy little puppy. But what others don't know is that he understands his own heart, he choose to exercise self-control and maintain a distance because… Yue Zhishi is Song-Yu’s only allergen.

title.en: My Perfect Enemy is Finally Broke

altTitles.en: My Nemesis Has Finally Gone Bankrupt

description.en:
When he woke up, Ji Ran, the son of a rich second generation, found himself lying beside his arch-nemesis from his school days. Qin Man! 

Despite reluctantly agreeing to a sponsorship agreement with the green tea black belly enemy, Ji Ran finds his lonely and stubborn heart gradually melting by the occasional tenderness displayed by Qin Man. 

[Scheming and gentle green tea x Sharp tongue but soft-hearted and charming person]

Behing the facade of a sponsorship agreement lies a decade-long unrequited love.
